entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
